core

Class Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Tools

  • public class Tools
extends java.lang.Object
    Class holding various convenience methods used throughout the whole web application. It also holds methods that have not been moved to their own packages
    Author:
    Stanislav Beran

        Parameters:
        m - - model containing triples with blank nodes to be renamed (used when client creates,updates new resource)

      • buildChildren

        public static void buildChildren(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m)
        Method used to retrieve(based on Describe) root resource and it's subsequent children as well If resource contains objects it searches the whole repository for triples not only in the particular named graph. This is required since we are renaming blanknodes into IRI's, therefore describe query on parent resource only is not sufficient.
        Parameters:
        m - - base model

      • checkForChoices

        public static void checkForChoices(org.json.JSONObject template)
        Method checks if choice items of RDF template have associated any dynamic choices retrieved from elsewhere.
        Parameters:
        template - - RDForm template json representation

      • changeRootTypes

        public static void changeRootTypes(org.json.JSONObject template,
                   java.lang.String type)
        Toggle between CREATE and UPDATE of RDForm template. It is required to change nodetype to appropriate one BLANK when creating resources URI when updating resources
        Parameters:
        template - -RDForm template representation
        type - - String BLANK or URI

      • getNewVersion

        public static java.lang.String getNewVersion(java.lang.String uri)
        Custom defined method to update current version of a resource, it relies for a resource to be ending with a decimal number, if it appends /1 to the uri
        Parameters:
        uri - - IRI to increment version of the resource
        Returns:
        new IRI with incremented version
